      Subclasses of BrokerException in framework.exception 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  WrongBrokerStateException
      Exception thrown when actions are attempted while the broker being in the wrong state.
      class  WrongModuleStateException
      Exception thrown when actions are attempted while module being in the wrong state.
